LAF-workbench documentation¶

Author¶

This work has been undertaken first in November 2013 by Dirk Roorda, working for Data Archiving and Networked Services (DANS) and The Language Archive (TLA). The work has been triggered by the execution of the SHEBANQ project together with the researchers at the Eep Talstra Centre for Bible and Computing (ETCBC), VU University.

See also a description on the DANS-lab site.
